name: Beebook - Beat the Feed
description:
Beebook

Beebook is the new social media sensation released to celebrate the kinda 10th game *1 realeased by Beebo Studios! Sign up now for free and beeb and rebeeb all your favourite *2 characters from the Beeboverse! *3 Features: 3 ineractive advertisements, 415 unique posts.

*1 depending on your calculations
*2 We are talking 75 characters here, there has to be a favourite!
*3 Please note that we are a very small Indie studio and Beebook is entirely financed by advertisements.

 

What to do

Navigating a feed is a rhythmic exercise of continuous scrolling. Ads drain a lot of battery, so remember to close them in time. You forgot your charger, so make the most of your time!  

Controls

Arrow Keys - react to prompts

Spacebar / Enter - only in menus: press buttons

Escape / F1 - pause

There are instructions in-game!

 

Credits:

bastilo - code wizard

Tekses - art director and app designer

lumue - master of rhythm

Purrseus - writer, animator

 

Special thanks to liswann (Molly, Briar Princess, Cherryboy, Cat, Bob Roswell, Flower Pot), enstef (Round Frog, Serene Frog) und lukasp (Penny) for the contribution of additional beebs!

 

Thank you for reading this far! You are a very special person to us

Have a fish! 🐟
